definition: Mt Everest/abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Nepalese: Sagarmatha/Mt Pearl (place name)/Zhushan district of Jingdezhen city 景德鎮市|景德镇市, Jiangxi
bead/pearl/CL:粒[li4],顆|颗[ke1]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Zhushan district of Jingdezhen city 景德鎮市|景德镇市, Jiangxi

sentences.english: Weld a contiguous bead around the entire circumference of the axle mount.
sentences.chinese: 焊縫的一個連續的整個圓周珠山周圍。

sentences.english: My words, quietly lying on the rocks, away against Zhushan, dress blowing.
sentences.chinese: 我的文字，靜靜地躺在岩石邊，遙對珠山，衣裙習習。

sentences.english: Located at the western region of Qingdao, "Little Pearl Hill" is to be the paradise center for Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 小珠山位於青島的西部地區，是青島的天堂地段。
